attributes.action: Allow fares to and from the workplace (i.e. commuting by railway) to be tax deductable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This might get people to use public transport.  Fares are a genuine expense that nobody can get out of unless they walk to and from work if they live near enough.   It would encourage people to look further afield for work and bring down unemployment figures as, what say, is the incentive of someone taking home after tax £370p.w. only to pay the railway £93 for a weekly ticket?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
